biography.bio: Jacob Matschenz was born in 1984 in Berlin, Germany. He is an actor, known for The Wave (2008), Move (2012) and À la frontière (2007).
biography.name: Jacob Matschenz

biography.bio: Jule Hermann is an actress, known for Till Eulenspiegel (2014), Fog in August (2016) and Timm Thaler oder das verkaufte Lachen (2017).
biography.name: Jule Hermann

biography.bio: Anna Bederke was born in Hamburg, Germany in 1981. Since early childhood she was drawn to storytelling, painting and playing music. Later in school she was part of a theater group for several years. For a number of years she played the violin and had lessons in piano and guitar. At the age of 16, she made her fist movie as a director. A few years later she got accepted to the School of fine Arts (HfbK) in Hamburg. There she made a few short films in the classes of Wim Wenders and Fatih Akin and she developed her writing skills. In order to finance her studies, she worked as a model, a bartender and she sold some of her paintings. In 2007 she received her directing diploma. One year later Fatih Akin told her that he wrote a part for her in his new movie "Soul Kitchen" and invited her to casting. After the audition she finally got the part ahead of several established actresses. "Variety" praised her debut by calling her "the real discovery". Next to Moritz Bleibtreu she plays "Lucia", the hard drinking waitress in the Restaurant "Soul Kitchen".
biography.name: Anna Bederke

biography.placeOfBirth: Bergen auf Rügen, East Germany [now Germany]
biography.bio: Devid Striesow was born on October 1, 1973 in Bergen auf Rügen, East Germany. He is an actor, known for The Counterfeiters (2007), Downfall (2004) and Yella (2007). He has been married to Francine since 2008. They have two children.
biography.name: Devid Striesow

biography.bio: Peter Jordan was born on April 26, 1967 in Dortmund, Germany. He is known for his work on The International (2009), The Runaway (2004) and Soul Kitchen (2009). He is married to Maren Eggert.
biography.name: Peter Jordan

biography.bio: Jakob Benkhofer is an actor, known for Jack Taylor: Priest (2013), Time Goes by Like a Roaring Lion (2013) and Ein blinder Held - Die Liebe des Otto Weidt (2014).
biography.name: Jakob Benkhofer

biography.bio: Peter Heinrich Brix was born on May 13, 1955 in Flensburg, Schleswig-Holstein, Germany. He is an actor, known for Großstadtrevier (1986), Neues aus Büttenwarder (1997) and Pfarrer Braun (2003).
biography.name: Peter Heinrich Brix

biography.bio: Eloi Christ is an actor, known for Help, I Shrunk My Teacher (2015), Burg Schreckenstein (2016) and Till Eulenspiegel (2014).
biography.name: Eloi Christ

biography.bio: Katja Danowski was born on April 20, 1974 in Hemer, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. She is an actress, known for Berlin Blues (2003), Trittschall im Kriechkeller (2011) and Mörderische Jagd (2012).
biography.name: Katja Danowski

biography.bio: Timo Dierkes was born on June 10, 1967 in Ibbenbüren, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. He is known for his work on Le transporteur 3 (2008), The Experiment (2001) and Heldt (2013).
biography.name: Timo Dierkes

biography.bio: Sebastian Kaufmane was born in 1982 in Neubrandenburg, German Democratic Republic. He is an actor, known for Young Goethe in Love (2010), A Cure for Wellness (2016) and Burnout (2011).
biography.name: Sebastian Kaufmane

biography.bio: Hedi Kriegeskotte was born in 1949 in Oberhausen, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. She is an actress, known for 23 (1998), Lammbock (2001) and Oi! Warning (1999).
biography.name: Hedi Kriegeskotte

biography.bio: Dirk Martens was born on July 2, 1964 in Mülheim an der Ruhr, Germany. He is an actor, known for Equilibrium (2002), SK Kölsch (1999) and Conspiracy (2001).
biography.name: Dirk Martens

biography.bio: Oda Thormeyer was born in 1964 in Fürstenau, Lower Saxony, Germany. She is an actress, known for Homevideo (2011), Felix (2007) and Erwin und Julia (1990).
biography.name: Oda Thormeyer
